Comment 1: 
This should be fixed in the most recent version.
    hg pull -u
to get to it, and then run all.bash again.

I am surprised that the log messages gives
the full path of the file as $GOROOT/src/pkg/log/log_test.go
and that make says 

    make[2]: Leaving directory `$GOROOT/src/pkg/log'

instead of giving a rooted path name.  What's going on there?
How does make know to call it $GOROOT instead of /home/you/go 
or whatever the path really is?
